stimulusHtml: What is the value of  x  after executing the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.
 

int[][] values = {{1, 2, 3},
                  {4, 5, 6}};
int x = 0;

for (int j = 0; j < values.length; j++)
{
   for (int k = 0; k < values[0].length; k++)
   {
      if (k == 0)
      {
         values[j][k] *= 2;
      }
      x += values[j][k];
   }
}
